title: Season 4 Top 3 Ranked 5v5 Challenger and Solo Queue Challenger looking for active 5s
body:
I enjoy playing 5s a lot more than I do solo queue, basically the jist of it. I'm looking for other players who are on frequently and like playing 5s. Not overly keen on strict time tables or "Pro Team Mentalities". If you are out there playing 5s in the upper elos and need another person, hit me up in-game. I also have some friends interested too if you yourself want to join in on 5s, or have a couple people and need a couple more then I'm sure we can arrange something there too. 

While I do enjoy playing with everyone the main focus with 5s for me is to win, so obviously previous or current experience in higher elos (namely diamond or challenger) is always a plus. While playing 5s I try and keep the atmosphere fun and enjoyable in skype etc, but at the end of the day I'm there to put pretty little icons on my video game account.

replies.body:
Hey, I added you ingame. 
I'm currently Diamond 5, I'm on frequently and enjoy playing ranked 5s.
